mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (reply_content, member_id, post_id) values (#{replyContent}, #{memberId}, #{postId})
mapper.select: select m.member_name, r.id, r.reply_content, r.member_id, r.post_id, r.created_datetime, r.updated_datetime from tbl_member m join tbl_reply r on m.id = r.member_id where post_id = #{id} order by r.id desc limit #{criteria.rowCount} offset #{criteria.offset}
select count(*) from tbl_reply where post_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply_content = #{replyContent}, updated_datetime = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
